predicate.note: Frames file for 'license' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: give legal rights to property

example.name: commercialism rules
example.text: Turns out that next year, Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the gang turn 40 -- and Scripps Howard's United Media unit, the syndicator and licensing agent for Charles Schulz's comic strip, sees a bonanza in *trace* licensing the cartoon characters to a bevy of advertisers for ads, tie-ins and promotions.
example.arg: *trace* -> Scripps Howard's United Media unit, the syndicator and licensing agent for Charles Schulz's comic strip,

example.name: reversed order
example.text: Sandoz Ltd. has licensed certain manufacturing and marketing rights for Interleukin-3 from Genetics Institute and is conducting preclinical studies with it.
example.arg: certain manufacturing and marketing rights for Interleukin-3

roleset.note: Rather like rent and lease, but I'm not going to make a new roleset.

predicate.note: I have the feeling there's also an 'allow' sense, which will take different framing, but we'll wait for an example from the corpus.
